name: HeadHunter (itch) (JamesWilson404, henrybhudson)
description:
This is a fast-paced strategic game, with a capturing atmosphere of a medieval tavern.

Put together the strongest team of warriors to fight various enemies! Your role is to view people’s applications and assign each of them depending on their traits and strengths.

If you miss quests (do not assign any characters to it), the world corruption level increases. There is a maximum number of deaths, and once you go over either of these limits (corruption level or death count), your game ends. Your aim is to complete as many quests as you can!

Controls

Right Click – Pick up and view application.

Left Click (over a quest, whilst holding an application) – Assign applicant to that quest.

Team Members

James Wilson

Henry Hudson
